attributes.action: stop Mars/Masterfoods using rennet in their chocolate products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Masterfoods have recently started using the rennet from calves stomaches in their products. It is unnecessary, cruel, and pointless, as they have prevented millions of people from enjoying their chocolate bars. This petition is to convince them to reconsider their position, and return their recipe to its former vegetarian friendly ingredients.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
